attributes.action: Force businesses to regenerate or demolish unused factory buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many successful businesses relocate their manufacturing bases and leave their disused factories to vandalism and decay. These disused buildings are often in high umemployment industrial areas which already have a poor image and therefore lack of outside investment.
These companies have the resources to demolish or regenerate these buildings and should be held responsible that this happens.
